s0021: Zhuang Jia feared, sent men galloped to report Jing Gong, requested rescue.
s0022: Already gone, not yet returned, thus then beheaded Zhuang Jia to show three armies.
s0024: After long time, Jing Gong sent envoy holding tally to pardon Jia, galloped into army.
s0025: Rangju said: 'General in army, lord's commands have some not accepted.'
s0026: Asked army officer: 'Galloping through three armies law what?'
s0029: Rangju said: 'Lord's envoy cannot kill him.'
s0030: Thus beheaded his groom, chariot's left driver, horse's left trace, to show three armies.
s0031: Sent envoy back to report, then proceeded.
s0032: Soldiers' encampments wells stoves food drink asked illness medicine, personally stroked and comforted them.
s0033: All took general's provisions to feast soldiers, body shared rations equally with soldiers.
s0034: First ranked their weak ones, three days then restrained troops.
s0035: Sick ones all sought to go, contended to rouse out for battle.
s0036: Jin army heard it, withdrew and left.
s0037: Yan army heard it, crossed water and dispersed.
s0038: Thus pursued them, then took the lost sealed territories former borders and led troops back.
s0039: Not yet reached state, released troops, dissolved regulations, swore covenant then entered towns.
s0040: Jing Gong with various grand officers welcomed in suburbs, rewarded army completed rites, then returned to palace.
